entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending early in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
